Apply Slip Days

Source: R/slip-days.R
apply_slip_days.Rd

This function applies any slip day policies within the policy file.

Usage

apply_slip_days(gs, policy)

Arguments

gs

A Gradescope dataframe

policy

A grading policy file as an R list

Value

A dataframe of the original Gradescope data with lateness updated according to the slip day policies

Examples

path <- system.file("extdata", "slip-days-policy-demo.yaml", package = "gradebook")
slip_days_policy_demo <- read_policy(path = path)
apply_slip_days(gs = gs_demo, policy = slip_days_policy_demo)
